attributes.action: back his statement that the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy is not about imposing "stealth taxes" or introducing "Big Brother" surveillance in law.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Prime Minister is genuine when he tells us the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy is not about imposing "stealth taxes" or introducing "Big Brother" surveillance, as his e-mail states, then let him seal this fact in law, preventing it occuring in the future - and increasing trust in the Government.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
